Interface DataManagerInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Tableizeable<DataManagerInterface>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Courses

    public interface DataManagerInterface
extends java.io.Serializable, Tableizeable<DataManagerInterface>
    Data Manager for the collection of Course objects. Stored in a binary search tree.
    Author:
    Professor Myers

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(DataElementInterface course)
      Adds a course into the binary search tree
      void add(java.lang.String cn, java.lang.String in, java.lang.String desc, int cred, java.lang.String day, java.lang.String hour)
      Creates a course from the following parameters and then adds the course to the binary search tree
      boolean remove(java.lang.String key)
      Removes a course from the binary search tree
      DataElementInterface search(java.lang.String key) 
      int size()
      Returns the number of elements in the Data Collection
      java.util.ArrayList<DataElementInterface> toArrayList()
      The courses in the binary search tree are put in an ArrayList based on in order traversal
      java.lang.String[][] toTable()
      The courses in the binary search tree are put in a two-dimensional array of Strings to populate the table [][0] - course number [][1] - instructor [][2] - description [][3] - credits [][4] - days [][5] - hours/time

    • Method Detail

      • add

        void add(DataElementInterface course)
        Adds a course into the binary search tree
        Parameters:
        course - - course to be added

      • add

        void add(java.lang.String cn,
         java.lang.String in,
         java.lang.String desc,
         int cred,
         java.lang.String day,
         java.lang.String hour)
        Creates a course from the following parameters and then adds the course to the binary search tree
        Parameters:
        cn - course number
        in - instructor
        desc - course description
        cred - number of credits
        day - days of class
        hour - time of class

      • remove

        boolean remove(java.lang.String key)
        Removes a course from the binary search tree
        Parameters:
        key - course number of course to remove
        Returns:
        true if remove is successful, false if key not found

      • search

        DataElementInterface search(java.lang.String key)
        Parameters:
        key - course number of course to search for
        Returns:
        reference to CourseElement if found, null if not found

      • size

        int size()
        Returns the number of elements in the Data Collection
        Returns:
        number of elements in the Data Collection

      • toArrayList

        java.util.ArrayList<DataElementInterface> toArrayList()
        The courses in the binary search tree are put in an ArrayList based on in order traversal
        Returns:
        ArrayList of CourseElements in order

      • toTable

        java.lang.String[][] toTable()
        The courses in the binary search tree are put in a two-dimensional array of Strings to populate the table [][0] - course number [][1] - instructor [][2] - description [][3] - credits [][4] - days [][5] - hours/time
        Specified by:
        toTable in interface Tableizeable<DataManagerInterface>
        Returns:
        two dimensional array of Strings to populate the table
